thread.title: Donald Trump Sat Behind The Wheel Of A Big Rig Today And The Pics Are Pretty Priceless
thread.title_full: Donald Trump Sat Behind The Wheel Of A Big Rig Today And The Pics Are Pretty Priceless

author: Brandon Wenerd
title: Donald Trump Sat Behind The Wheel Of A Big Rig Today And The Pics Are Pretty Priceless
text:
Getty Image

It’s hard to imagine Donald Trump ever behind the wheel of anything except a golf cart, but today he had a chance to sit behind a Mack Truck during a White House showing of support for the truck drivers of America. The photo op of POTUS in a Mack big-rig is pretty hilarious, as far as Presidential photo-ops go.
Trump having fun pic.twitter.com/D8rpovCV97 
— Tanya Chen (@Tanya_Chen) March 23, 2017 
Getty Image

Getty Image

He even got the toot the horn!
President Trump climbs into a truck and honks its horn at a White House event with trucking executives pic.twitter.com/d2MKdxYc2i 
— CNN (@CNN) March 23, 2017
